name: VELARUM
description:
One of the only games about flying a bird that is not flappy bird. You control a bird with the arrow keys or WASD and shoot with Z or X or the mouse.

Features:

  • Accurate Bird Flying Simulation.
  • Over 25 Levels (More to come)
  • High quality sound effects.
  • Music
  • Blood effects.
  • Action Gameplay.

Music: http://incompetech.com/
